goal:
Within the key areas of Political Risk Management & Consulting Services (Public Affairs, Government Relations Consulting, Lobbying Services, and Strategic Communication), we are skilled at delivering powerful solutions by leveraging our huge experience in the public and private sectors to help clients negotiate complex political, government, and business issues, and achieve the most favourable results.

We guide the relationships between people, ideas, and organisations and master the dynamics of government policy, complex markets, associations and business sectors by moving clients goals forward, raising awareness of the issues critical to the success of clients' mission on a local, national and regional level in South East Europe.

Whether it is legislative affairs, executive branch relations, regulatory solutions, or all of the above, we develop custom-made strategies to meet our clients’ needs that will support their long-term success.

To meet a variety of business objectives, such as influencing public policy, strengthening an organization’s reputation or finding common ground with important stakeholders including government, media, local communities, clients, shareholders, trade associations, think tanks, business groups, not-for-profits, employees, unions, or customers we offer:

Strategic Communications, Government Relations, Lobbying, Community Relations, Corporate Relations, Stakeholder Relations, Issue Monitoring and Management, Intelligence Gathering, Access and Advocacy, Ally Development and Influencer Engagement, Coalition Building, Perception Analysis, Image Enhancement, Digital and Social Advocacy, Opinion Research, Crisis Management, Reputation Management, Legislative Drafting, Regulatory and Impact Assessment, Political Strategy and Campaigns.
